oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Symposium Planned for March 1987
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: N/A, N/A
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: To honor the memory of Dr. Jean Delacour and Rocco Sanducci, the IFCB (International Foundation for the Conservation of Birds) is planning a memorial symposium on breeding birds in captivity March 11-14, 1987.Approximately forty speakers from around the world will be addressing avian subjects concerning: ecology, conservation, field work, aviculture, nutrition, husbandry, medical research, etc.Mark your calendars and plan ahead.We invite you to become part of this experience.This symposium will be held at the Sheraton Premiere Hotel in Universal City, California (Los Angeles area). For more information please write: IFCB Symposium 1987, 11300 Weddington, North Hollywood, CA 91601, or call Dale Thompson, (818) 980-9818. •
